EmailTemplate.subject: Travel Grant more information required
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear ,
Graduate Education received your travel grant application to attend conference in ..........
To finalise your application, could you please email me the following documents immediately:
1. A copy of your accepted abstract, clearly stating your name as the author and Monash University as your institutional affiliation.
2. A written statement from the conference confirming that your abstract has been accepted for presentation.
3. An itinerary of the research/fieldwork that will be undertaking and any correspondence exchanged between you and a third party (it can be any registrations, invitations or email confirmations).
4. Travel insurance document - http://intranet.monash.edu.au/finance/assets/attachments/student-ecard.pdf
